args: Enhance accessibility to meet WCAG 2.1 AA compliance for RIS HR System. 1) Add skip-to-main-content link at top of page 2) Ensure all images have meaningful alt text 3) Add aria-label to all icon-only buttons across components 4) Implement focus trap in modal.js for keyboard users 5) Add visible focus rings (focus:ring-2 focus:ring-cg-info) to all interactive elements 6) Ensure color contrast ratio meets 4.5:1 minimum 7) Add aria-live regions for toast notifications and dynamic content updates 8) Make data tables navigable via keyboard with proper th scope attributes 9) Add role='alert' to error messages 10) Test tab order and fix any issues 11) Add aria-expanded to collapsible sections.
